I will rephrase my prior question. Is anybody aware of a prior application =
of NEAT (not HyperNeat) of direct encoding, in which the actual individual =
structure is the output, and NOT the activation output of same? The structu=
re of the individual and associated traits being passed for objective funct=
ion evaluation and subsequent evolution by NEAT?
